Instruction.InstructionText: TO REDEEM YOUR CODE ON BATTLE.NET: 1. Go to battle.net/code 2. Create a FREE Battle.net account or Log in. 3. Enter the activation code.

Go to www.battle.net/playd3
- Create a FREE Battle.net account or if you already have one, log in.
- Enter the activation code printed on this receipt
- Create a BattleTag (this is your Battle.net user name)
- Download and install Diablo III
